data.comment: The match has started.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 2, Allen Chapman awards Seattle a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle's Jordan Morris misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In the minute 7, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Portland have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Raul Ruidiaz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Seattle.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Seattle.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Seattle drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 13, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Diego Chara.
Jeremy Ebobisse instrumental with a fine assist.
Seattle are pushing forward but Raul Ruidiaz's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Throw-in Portland.
Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for Seattle, close to Portland's area.
In the minute 19, Nicolas Lodeiro of Seattle gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 20, Allen Chapman awards the away team a throw-in.
In Portland Seattle attack through Raul Ruidiaz. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Allen Chapman awards Portland a goal kick.
Allen Chapman signals a Portland throw-in in Seattle's half.
In the minute 27, Portland to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Seattle.
Seattle are coming forward and Nicolas Lodeiro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 28, Portland have a goal kick.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 29, Can Seattle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
Portland have a goal kick.
Seattle pushes forward through Jordan Morris, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Portland drive upfield and Yimmi Chara gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Seattle defender.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 33, Portland's Jaroslaw Niezgoda breaks free at Providence Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Seattle drives forward and Joevin Jones gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Seattle at Providence Park.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Portland.
In the minute 36, Seattle's Raul Ruidiaz misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
Free kick Portland.
Nouhou Tolo for Seattle has been booked by Allen Chapman and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 39, Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Portland in the half of Seattle.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Seattle.
Portland needs to be cautious. Seattle have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Seattle have a dangerous throw-in.
Joevin Jones of Seattle smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
At Providence Park the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Allen Chapman awards the away team a throw-in.
Important block from the Seattle defence as Diego Valeri fires in a strike for Portland.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 45, Allen Chapman awards Seattle a goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
Goal kick for Seattle at Providence Park.
In the minute 46, Gustav Svensson is replacing Nouhou Tolo for Seattle at Providence Park.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 48, Allen Chapman awards Portland a goal kick.
Attention is being given to Seattleâ€™s Joevin Jones and play has been suspended briefly.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Seattle to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Alex Roldan (Seattle) has replaced the possibly injured Joevin Jones.
In the minute 54, Portland have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pablo Bonilla (Portland) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 56, Raul Ruidiaz (Seattle) has received a yellow card from Allen Chapman.
Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Portland.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 59, Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Throw-in for Portland close to the penalty box.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
In the minute 62, Allen Chapman signals a Seattle throw-in in Portland's half.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
In Portland Seattle drive forward through Joao Paulo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Portland.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a Seattle throw-in in Portland's half.
In the minute 65, In Portland a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Throw-in for Portland at Providence Park.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
In the minute 71, Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a first substitution, with Felipe Mora replacing Jaroslaw Niezgoda.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
In the minute 75, Portland make their third substitution with Andy Polo replacing Jeremy Ebobisse.
Giovanni Savarese is making the team's second substitution at Providence Park with Marvin Loria replacing Yimmi Chara.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Shane O'Neill with Will Bruin. This is the third substitution made today by Brian Schmetzer.
Eryk Williamson is booked for the home team.
In the minute 79, Seattle are caught offside.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Portland have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
Miguel Ibarra is replacing Kelvin Leerdam for the away team.
In the minute 85, Seattle have a goal kick.
Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a fourth substitution, with Larrys Mabiala replacing Diego Valeri.
The home team replace Eryk Williamson with Cristhian Paredes.
Free kick Portland.
Allen Chapman awards Seattle a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Seattle.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Cristhian Paredes for Portland drives towards goal at Providence Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Seattle are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Portland.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
At Providence Park, Alex Roldan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Portland's Steve Clark has been booked in Portland.
